name: One Dot One Life
description:
Don't miss a cup. How many dots can you drip? Challenge your friends to see who can last the longest.

0-19: Do you even dot bro?
20-49: Ok...I guess.
50-99: You probably got that score while taking a dump. Nice job though.
100 and over: WHAT?! You're a freak, or you wasted 30 seconds of your life on an ad (thanks btw).
